sabina

Class Filter

  • java.lang.Object
    • sabina.Action
      • sabina.Filter

  • public final class Filter
extends Action
    A Filter is built up by a path (for url-matching) and the implementation of the 'handle' method. When a request is made, if present, the matching routes 'handle' method is invoked.

      This is just a "type alias".
